error.url_error: The URL could not be opened.

data_description.max_entries: The maximum number of entries to extract from each feed.

import_yaml_error_url_error.title: The Feedreader YAML configuration import failed
import_yaml_error_url_error.description:
Configuring the Feedreader using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error when trying to import the YAML configuration for `{url}`.

Please verify that url is reachable and accessable for Home Assistant and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Feedreader YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to set up the integration manually.
